error.message: Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\purest_content\Normalizer\ContentNormalizer::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated method getVocabularyId() of class Drupal\taxonomy\TermInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use TermInterface::bundle() instead.

Parameter $alias_manager of method Drupal\purest_content\Plugin\rest\resource\ContentResource::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManager. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManager instead.

Parameter $alias_storage_interface of method Drupal\purest_content\Plugin\rest\resource\ContentResource::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasStorageInterface: \Drupal\Core\Path\AliasStorage is deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the "path_alias.repository" service instead, or the entity storage handler for the "path_alias" entity type for CRUD methods.
Calls to function dpm should not exist.

Call to deprecated method isSubclassOf() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeInterface::entityClassImplements() instead.

Declaration of Drupal\purest\Plugin\rest\resource\EntityResourceValidationTrait::validate(Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface $entity) should be compatible with Drupal\user\Plugin\rest\resource\UserRegistrationResource::validate(Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface $entity, array $fields_to_validate = Array)

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Class Drupal\purest\PuRestServiceProvider was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to purest.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
